description:
Cinnamon discusses the wonders of modern HVAC. Ichiko and Cinnamon lose weight in the only way they know how.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kotatsu de Hokkori: Gokkan Ettou Kogarashi Fuyushougun
